response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for you. I understand its significance and would like to extend a special offer. I propose to sell the product to you for $1,300,000. This price reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic value to you and my asking price, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations or if you require further details about the product. I am here to answer any questions you might have.", "product_price": 1300000}
